## ChunkLatticeEventPayloads."CHUNK\_LATTICE.REMOVE\_CHUNK" property

Emitted when a chunk is removed from the lattice.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ChunkLatticeEvent.REMOVE_CHUNK]: {
        chunkLattice: ChunkLattice;
        chunk: Chunk;
    };
```
